com.knowgate.typeutils

Class ObjectFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.knowgate.typeutils.ObjectFactory

  • public class ObjectFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class with helper methods for object instantiation using reflection.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio Montoro Ten

    • Method Detail

      • getConstructor

        public static java.lang.reflect.Constructor<? extends java.lang.Object> getConstructor(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Object> objectClass,
                                                                                       java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterClasses)
                                                                                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        Get the constructor for a class that matches the given parameter classes.

        Parameters:
        objectClass - Class<? extends Object>
        parameterClasses - Class<?>[]
        Returns:
        Constructor<? extends Object> or null if there is no constructor with given parameters at the class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If more than one constructor is suitable for the given arguments but its signature does not exactly match the classes of the parameters

      • filterParameters

        public static java.lang.Object[] filterParameters(java.lang.reflect.Parameter[] parameters,
                                                  java.lang.Object[] parameterValues)
                                           throws java.lang.InstantiationException

        Filter parameter values that has the necessary types.

        Case 1. If parameters.length is equal to parameterValues.length then the types of parameterValues will be checked to match the ones specified at parameters. If the types do not match then InstantiationException will be thrown. If the types match then parameterValues will be returned.

        Case 2. If parameters.length is less than parameterValues.length then the first n parameter values with the same types as parameters will be returned.

        Case 3. If parameters.length is greater than parameterValues.length then InstantiationException will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        parameters - Parameter[]
        parameterValues - Object[]
        Returns:
        Object[]
        Throws:
        java.lang.InstantiationException

      • signature

        public static java.lang.String signature(java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Object> objectClass,
                                         java.lang.Class<?>[] parameterClasses)
        Generate a String which represent the signature of the given classes. The signature is generated by concatenating the class names.
        Parameters:
        objectClass - Class<? extends Object>
        parameterClasses - Class<?>[]
        Returns:
        String

      • getClassTree

        public static java.lang.Class<?>[] getClassTree(java.lang.Class<?> clss)
        Get super classes and implemented interfaces of the given class
        Parameters:
        clss - Class<?>
        Returns:
        Class<?>[] Superclasses followed
